sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Button } from '../ButtonElement' import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, Img, ImgWrap } from './InfoElements' const InfoSection = ({ lightBg, id, imgStart, topLine, lightText, headLine, darkText, description, buttonLabel, img, alt, primary, dark, da }) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headLine} {description} ) } export default InfoSection
